content: washington boulevard mittens by alicia dehart these mittens are knit in the round from cuff to fingertip with ribbing stockinette increase and decrease stitches this pattern can be knit by a beginner knitter washington boulevard is a simple and elegant street in big spring tx materials abbreviations fingering weight yarn approximately 185 yards bor = beginning of round us 0 / 2 mm dpns or circular needle for magic co = cast on loop or size needed for gauge k = knit stitch markers - 2 k2tog = knit 2 together waste yarn m1l = make 1 left scissors m1r = make 1 right yarn needle p = purl pm = place marker gauge pu = pick up stockinette in the round rm = remove marker 13 sts in 2 inches round s = round s 18 row in 2 inches sm = slip marker ssk = slip slip knit size women s medium/men s small sts = stitches pattern the pattern is given in sections and organized in a table the rounds are numbered in the left- most column the pattern instructions are given in the middle column and the number of stitches at the end of that round is given in the right-most column cuff co 52 sts 52 sts round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * around 52 sts repeat round 1 until piece measures 3 inches 52 sts thumb gusset round 2 k around 52 sts round 3 k25 m1l k1 k26 53 sts round 4 k26 pm m1l k1 m1r pm k26 55 sts round 5 k around 55 sts round 6 k around 55 sts round 7 k26 sm m1l k to marker m1r sm k26 57 sts repeat rnds 5-7 seven more times so knit rnds 5-7 a total of 8 times 71 sts round 8 k around 71 sts round 9 k around 71 sts round 10 k to marker rm put thumb sts on waste yarn rm k to end 52 sts hand round 11 k around 52 sts repeat round 11 until piece measures 3 5 inches from thumb separation 52 sts round 12 *k1 ssk k20 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 48 sts round 13 k around 48 sts round 14 k around 48 sts round 15 *k1 ssk k18 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 44 sts round 16 k around 44 sts round 17 *k1 ssk k16 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 40 sts round 18 k around 40 sts round 19 *k1 ssk k14 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 36 sts round 20 *k1 ssk k12 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 32 sts round 21 *k1 ssk k10 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 28 sts round 22 *k1 ssk k8 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 24 sts round 23 *k1 ssk k6 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 20 sts kitchener stitch the remaining 20 sts together 10 sts for front and
